name: symbolically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that represents something else: It is important symbolically for this museum to be in the right location. Economically, it's not a big deal, but symbolically, it's enormous. See
symbolic
More examplesFewer examplesThe paper dollar means a lot to people symbolically. Symbolically, this is the most important statement she has made.Her choice of book was symbolically significant.
